com.mstudenets.studenetsbananaapp.view.fragments

Class ContactBookFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.mstudenets.studenetsbananaapp.view.fragments.ContactsFragment
        • com.mstudenets.studenetsbananaapp.view.fragments.ContactBookFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener 

    public class ContactBookFragment
extends ContactsFragment
    Fragment that displays contacts from the device's contact book. For these contacts only call action is available. The user is not allowed to modify or delete contact records. Requires READ_CONTACTS permission to display contacts and CALL_PHONE to make phone calls to selected contacts. Contacts list is fetched using AsyncTask to prevent blocking UI thread.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ContactBookFragment.LoadContactsTask
      Asynchronous task to retrieve device phone book contacts.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateView

        public android.view.View onCreateView(android.view.LayoutInflater inflater,
                                      android.view.ViewGroup container,
                                      android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Inflates fragment view and checks required permissions to fetch user's contacts. If the permission was granted, fetches contacts using AsyncTask
        Overrides:
        onCreateView in class ContactsFragment
        Returns:
        view to be inflated to the fragment

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        Called when fragment resumes after being paused. Checks READ_CONTACTS permissions in case the user revoked it leaving the application running in the background
        Overrides:
        onResume in class android.support.v4.app.Fragment

      • getPhoneBookContacts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Contact> getPhoneBookContacts()
        Returns list of device's contacts
        Returns:
        device phone book contacts

      • onRequestPermissionsResult

        public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode,
                                       @NonNull
                                       java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                       @NonNull
                                       int[] grantResults)
        Called when the app receives a result of a permission request (on API 23 and higher). Retrieves and displays device phone book contacts if the permission is granted or displays a Toast message with details if the permission was denied
        Overrides:
        onRequestPermissionsResult in class android.support.v4.app.Fragment

      • initializeRecyclerView

        private void initializeRecyclerView()
        Creates new MyContactsAdapter adapter. Sets layout manager for contacts RecyclerView. Adds horizontal item decoration to the contacts view. Sets new MyContactsAdapter as a RecyclerView adapter.

      • checkContactsPermission

        private void checkContactsPermission()
        Used to request run time permission to read device phone book contacts. If the permission is granted, retrieves contact list.

      • retrieveContacts

        private void retrieveContacts()
        Executes ContactBookFragment.LoadContactsTask asynchronous task to read device phone book's contact list and initializes RecyclerView by calling initializeRecyclerView().
